briefTitle: Clinical Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of DF289 Plus DF277 Otic Solution in the Treatment of Middle Ear Infections in Pediatric Patients
officialTitle: Clinical Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of DF289 Plus DF277 Otic Solution in the Treatment of Middle Ear Infections in Pediatric Patients
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if the combination of DF289 plus DF277 is safe and effective in treating middle ear infections in children with ear tubes.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From baseline until the end of the study ( up to 22 days)
